The Twitter account: iaMeetuSingh claimed to be the "official account" of Sushant Singh Rajput's sister, Meetu Singh.
Sushant Singh Rajput: s sister, Shweta, confirmed that @iaMeetuSingh is a fake account and urged people to report it.
Meetu Singh: s genuine Instagram account had previously shared the same image that was posted by the imposter account.
The caption used in the imposter account: s tweet was identical to a tweet made by Sushant's sister, Priyanka, on a different date.
